body:
Many writing systems that we use today descended directly from the alphabet created by Greeks in 800 BC.

* Α α 1	alpha	[a] [aː], [a] => a
* Β β 2	beta	[b], [v] => b, v
* Γ γ 3	gamma	[ɡ], [ɣ] => g, gh, y
* Δ δ 4	delta	[d], [ð] => d
* Ε ε 5	epsilon	[e], [e] => e
* Ζ ζ 7	zeta	[zd] [dz], [z] => z
* Η η 8	eta	[ɛː], [i] => h, e
* Θ θ 9	theta	[tʰ], [θ] => th
* Ι ι 10 iota	[i] [iː], [i] => i
* Κ κ 20 kappa	[k], [k] => k, c
* Λ λ 30 lambda	[l], [l] => l
* Μ μ 40 mu	[m], [m] => m
* Ν ν 50 nu	[n], [n] => n
* Ξ ξ 60 xi	[ks], [ks] => ks, x
* Ο ο 70 omicron [o], [o] => o
* Π π 80 pi	[p], [p] => p
* Ρ ρ 100 rho	[r], [r] => r
* Σ σ ς 200 sigma [s], [s] => s
* Τ τ 300 tau	[t], [t] => t
* Υ υ 400 upsilon	[y] [yː], [i] => y
* Φ φ 500 phi	[pʰ], [f] => f, ph
* Χ χ 600 chi	[kʰ], [x] => x, ch, h
* Ψ ψ 700 psi	[ps], [ps] => ps
* Ω ω 800 omega	[ɔː], [o] => o

Numeral Only
* ϛ 6 digamma 
* ϟ 90 koppa
* ϡ 900 sampi

### Support or Contact

If you are having difficulty with Unicode in your computer programs, contact mwest@dene.ca and I’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: it's all ελληνικά to me
